page.title: 16HENRY WIGGINS NICKEL ALLOY
page.content: Wiggins belongs to a group of factories and it is twinned with a factory in Huntington,Virginia.The company has been formed since 1835 150 years.The sight was chosen at Hereford because they didn't what all the factories in Birmingham.It was called Wiggins after a man called Henry Wiggins.On the site where Wiggins was built,there was waste land before Wiggins was there.There were not many objections of the building of Wiggins because it was council land.When Wiggins moved to Hereford they had no plans to move anywhere else.Wiggins was opened in 1953.
